name: Dretch
description: A bloated, twisted form covered in sores and patches of matted fur, with glowing eyes that exude malevolent stupidity.
memorable: Its ability to disrupt opponents with its Energy-Sucking Aura and its resilience, coming back to life unless purified.
goals: To serve more powerful demons and create chaos in battle.
relations: Often found alongside more powerful demons as expendable minions.
strengths: Immunity to poison damage and ability to hinder enemy actions in combat through unique abilities.
weaknesses: Very low damage output and poor mental acuity with low intelligence and charisma.
attacks: Can bite or claw, dealing minimal damage with the potential for poison effects.
most_powerful_ability: Energy-Sucking Aura, limiting enemy actions within a certain radius.
senses: Has a passive perception of 9, indicating poor sensory capability.
additional_information: Can return to life in the Abyss within 1d10 days after dying unless purified with holy water.
Uses Fetid Cloud to obscure vision and poison enemies.
Serves as cannon fodder in battles.
Attacks in numbers to overwhelm enemies.
test_queries: small demon that disrupts enemy actions
chaotic evil fiend that poisons enemies
